hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: Initiatory journeys for visionary women at thresholds of change
hero.description: I work with women navigating deep transitions — emotional patterns, creative blocks, spiritual awakenings — who are ready to meet themselves honestly and embody what is emerging.
hero.statement1: This is not about fixing yourself.
hero.statement2: It's about remembering who you are beneath what no longer fits.
hero.cta: Start with a free discovery call

invitation.title: You're here because something is shifting
invitation.intro: Not because you're broken or lost — but because the way you've been living, creating, or relating no longer holds.
invitation.subtitle: You might recognize yourself here:
lines: You're intuitive, sensitive, and creative — and something feels blocked.
You're at a crossroads (Saturn return, life transition, awakening).
You've outgrown old identities, relationships, or ways of being.
You sense there's more trying to come through — and you're ready to listen.
invitation.closing: This work is for women who feel the call to step into themselves more fully, without bypassing, forcing, or performing transformation.

howIWork.title: How I work
howIWork.intro1: Every journey is different — because every woman arrives with her own story, wounds, and readiness.
howIWork.intro3: Only attuned presence, deep listening, and honest reflection.
howIWork.pillarsIntro: My work is grounded in three pillars:

pillars.title: Embodied presence
pillars.description: We work with the body — breath, sensation, and nervous system — not just conversation. Real change happens when insight lands in the body, not only the mind.

pillars.title: Honest reflection
pillars.description: I won't simply validate you. I'll reflect what I see, ask clear questions, and name patterns with care and truth. Growth requires honesty, not comfort.

pillars.title: Integration
pillars.description: Insights are grounded into daily life through practical steps and ongoing integration — so change is lived, not just understood.

waysToWork.title: Ways to work together
waysToWork.intro: We always begin with a conversation and move at a pace that feels right.

discoveryCall.title: Free Discovery Call
discoveryCall.description: A calm, 20-minute conversation to explore what you're navigating and whether this work feels aligned.

sessions.title: Single Session
sessions.description: A one-off session for clarity, grounding, or support during a specific moment or transition.

fourSessions.title: The 4-Session Cycle
fourSessions.description: The primary way many women choose to work together. This rhythm allows space for depth, continuity, and integration — without rushing or forcing change.
fourSessions.pacing: Scheduled at a pace that supports your nervous system.

waysToWork.closing: Further work — including integration support, longer containers, or retreats — is explored naturally through conversation.

notRightFor.title: This work may not be right for you
lines: If you're looking for a quick fix or someone to "heal" you.
If you want direction instead of discovering your own truth.
If you're unwilling to practice or integrate between sessions.
Or if you're in acute mental health crisis (I'll help you find appropriate support).
notRightFor.closing2: I'm here to guide — not to fix.

about.title: About Nina
about.bio: I've been guiding this work for over 10 years. I meet people heart to heart — with presence, honesty, and respect for each woman's rhythm and capacity. My approach weaves embodied awareness, intuitive insight, and grounded integration.
about.languages: Sessions are available in English, Spanish, and French.

contact.title: Begin the conversation
contact.intro: If you're feeling the call to work together, start with a free discovery call.
exploreItems: whether this feels aligned for both of us
contact.note: No pressure. No sales pitch. Just clarity.
contact.boundary: Messages are read carefully and replied to when appropriate.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me what brings you here...
